__UIC_CONTENT__: Unique Identification Code (UIC) is an innovative agritech solution by Farmkart. Itâ€™s a digital identity which simplifies online agri-shopping experience by providing personalised experience based on unique needs.
__UIC_CONTENTNEW__: By registering with Farmkart UIC, you can buy all products at UIC prices. Also, you can  get additional  discounts, personalised product suggestions, free delivery, volume discount, and offers.

__FARM_HEADING__: Letâ€™s make the right decision together
__FARM_DESCRIPTION__: Farmkart provides agricultural consulting services to the farmers, with the help of our in-house professional agronomists. We provide personalized services Soil Sampling, Seed Variety Recommendation, Insect Scouting, Irrigation Scheduling, Detailed Field Reports, Fertilizer Recommendation, Regular Field Checks, Chemical Use Recommendation, Equipment Calibration, and Crop Rotation Planning. Farmkart aims to increase awareness among farmers about using the right agri-inputs for optimizing their yield by making high-quality products available to them at affordable prices.
